title: PVK/Vervaeke/Pageau Recents, Dynamic Thinkers, CS Lewis vs Pirsig Morality, We are Legion
description: Some comments from looking at Paul's Rough Draft for Sunday and Critique with John Vervaeke. Why do they get along so well up in here? Pageau's critique of Pinker, Parts of Self (take care of them), and that Old Fashioned Rationality!
